## Security Checklist

**All PRs must address these security considerations:**

- [ ] No secrets, API keys, or credentials are included in this PR
- [ ] Sensitive data is stored in `/secrets/` directory (not committed)
- [ ] Environment variables are used for configuration (not hardcoded)
- [ ] Dependencies added are from trusted sources
- [ ] AI-generated code has been reviewed for security issues
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced (checked by CI)
